name: Just Be A Horse
description:
Far off in a meadow somewhere far away from people and cars and civilization there is a horse and that horse can be you!

Live a life on the open plains surviving the day to day adventures of being a Horse! Customize and name your Horse then survive by competing for food and avoiding predators. Level up your Horses skills to become top of the food chain!

But being a horse is not without its challenges, other creatures want to graze the same fields you do and some animals don't want to eat the grass, some just want to eat you! You will need to keep moving to find fresh food, before the other animals get there first!

Relax to soothing music as you munch on grass, play with deer and listen to the relaxing environment of Mellow Meadows.

Controls WASD to walk, shift to run, F to feed, left click to attack
